faq_q1: How can I get a job at ARIB Dairy?
faq_a1: You can visit the Careers page on our official website to view vacancies and apply via the electronic form. You can also send your CV to the email:
faq_q2: How can I check the status of my job application submitted to ARIB Dairy?
faq_a2: You can follow up on your application status via the email you used for submission, or contact us via:
faq_q3: How can I join a training program at ARIB Dairy?
faq_a3: ARIB Dairy provides training programs for students and graduates. You can apply via email:
faq_q4: How can I provide feedback on a product?
faq_a4: If you have any feedback or complaints, you can contact us via:
faq_q5: How can I find out about ARIB Dairy's brands and products?
faq_a5: You can visit the Our Products page on the website, where you will find all the details.
